entries.title: TMZ TV Hot Takes: Diddy, Kim Richards, Pittsburgh Steelers
entries.summary: Diddy is facing a new lawsuit for sexual assault, Kim Richards is beefing with Kyle Richards over a psych hold, and the Pittsburgh Steelers have a quarterback controversy brewing ... all this on today's TMZ TV Hot Takes. First up on "TMZ Live,"…

entries.title: "Saturday Night Live" Cast 'Memba Them?!
entries.summary: "Live From New York ... It's Saturday Night!" It's been nearly 50 fabulous years of legendary comedians and actors hitting the Studio 8H stage at 30 Rockefeller Plaza -- making their stage presence known and providing laughs to millions around the…
